title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat, or embeddings backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, RAG, admin panel) similar to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async IEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Chroma, and Redis for quick RAG setups.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; 60k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package; 200k+ monthly downloads, supports 3.8+.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama using context and io.Reader streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private on-prem LLM chats.
